metadata.title: CVE-2021-3670 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - low
metadata.description:
MaxQueryDuration not honoured in Samba AD DC LDAP

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-3670` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

ctdb - 2:4.19.5+dfsg-4ubuntu9
libnss-winbind - 2:4.19.5+dfsg-4ubuntu9
libpam-winbind - 2:4.19.5+dfsg-4ubuntu9
libsmbclient0 - 2:4.19.5+dfsg-4ubuntu9
libwbclient0 - 2:4.19.5+dfsg-4ubuntu9
python3-samba - 2:4.19.5+dfsg-4ubuntu9
registry-tools - 2:4.19.5+dfsg-4ubuntu9
samba - 2:4.19.5+dfsg-4ubuntu9
samba-ad-dc - 2:4.19.5+dfsg-4ubuntu9
samba-ad-provision - 2:4.19.5+dfsg-4ubuntu9
samba-common - 2:4.19.5+dfsg-4ubuntu9
samba-common-bin - 2:4.19.5+dfsg-4ubuntu9
samba-dsdb-modules - 2:4.19.5+dfsg-4ubuntu9
samba-libs - 2:4.19.5+dfsg-4ubuntu9
samba-testsuite - 2:4.19.5+dfsg-4ubuntu9
samba-vfs-modules - 2:4.19.5+dfsg-4ubuntu9
samba-vfs-modules-extra - 2:4.19.5+dfsg-4ubuntu9
smbclient - 2:4.19.5+dfsg-4ubuntu9
winbind - 2:4.19.5+dfsg-4ubuntu9
ldb-tools - 2:2.8.0+samba4.19.5+dfsg-4ubuntu9
libldb2 - 2:2.8.0+samba4.19.5+dfsg-4ubuntu9
python3-ldb - 2:2.8.0+samba4.19.5+dfsg-4ubuntu9
No subscription required

criterions.comment: samba package in oracular, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2:4.16.2+dfsg-1ubuntu1').
